content: I'll just describe my pitch deck to you, and you can provide feedback. My pitch deck is for my startup, which is a platform that helps small businesses manage their online presence. The first slide is a title slide with our company name, logo, and tagline. The second slide is a problem statement slide that describes the challenges small businesses face in managing their online presence. The third slide describes our solution, which is a platform that allows small businesses to manage their website, social media, and online reviews in one place. The fourth slide highlights the market opportunity, including the number of small businesses in the US and the growing importance of online presence. The fifth slide describes our competitive landscape, including other companies that offer similar solutions. The sixth slide talks about our traction, including the number of beta testers we've signed up and the positive feedback we've received. The seventh slide outlines our business model, which is a subscription-based model. The eighth slide introduces our team, including our founders and their
